Articles.Content:
KSP: 0.25.0 Windows 32bit

Problem: I cannot recover spacecraft

Details: After landing a spacecraft and I choose to recover the spacecraft via any method I get the KSC screen displaying the crew and 0.0 reputation gain. When I check in the tracking station all the spacecraft (and crew) are still landed at Kerbin.

Mods:

-Near Future Mods (Electircal v2.2, Solar v2.2, Craft v2.1, Construction v2.3)

-FAR v0.14.2

-Visual Enhancements v7.4

-DMagic Orbital Science v0.8.5.1

This was on a fresh save. The game does not crash or anything, but I cannot recover craft (and therefore get their juicy science )

How to replicate:

1. Launch a crewed spacecraft

2. Recover it

3. Realise you have not recovered it (check tracking station)

Edited October 12, 2014 by BrainiacBlue

Please read the instructions in the "How to get support" stick thread in this sub-forum and follow them (particularly the parts about the list of mods and their versions and supplying an output_log.txt/player.log file).
